name: charfall
description:
Charfall by Toka32.
--------------------------------
- A simple game made for fun.
- The objective is to eat as many characters as possible while avoiding the corrupted ones.
- The game will get harder the more you eat, so be careful.
- You can also be awarded with an extra live every 10 chars eaten.
--------------------------------
-Left- and -Right- Moves the player.
-F1- Restarts the game.
-F2- Changes the size of the screen.
--------------------------------
S2 I hope you enjoy!
